title: Free flu vaccines for secondary school kids

content.text: All secondary school pupils in England will be offered a free flu vaccine from September for the 2023/24 season, the government has confirmed.
Over 3 million pupils in secondary school years 7 to 11 will be offered the vaccine as a nasal spray through their school’s vaccination programme from 1 September.
